name: Kung Fu Fight Street 1 PV 1
description:
Kung Fu Fight Street 1 PV 1 is the ultimate fighting tournament all kung Fu fighters around the world train years for. Show off your Taekwondo, Ninja and Kung Fu skills and assassinate players from around the globe. Show your Taekwondo, Ninja and Kung Fu skills to the whole world and emerge victor among the most dangerous players of the planet. Beat enemies in one on one combat mode and fight two rounds with them.
Features:

1. Ultimate Deadly devastating combos.
2. Action packed missions to compete.
3. Incredible game-physics and fast paced game-play.
4. Be the strongest street fighting machine!
